short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI powered design feedback on any website. Your personal design copilot.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
📷 Capture Screen --> Design Feedback (Powered by AI!)

✅ Activate the extension
📷 Click the "Capture Screen" button
👇 Drag and release to draw the area to capture
🤖 Receive instant AI design feedback for the website

Key Features: 🔑

- Capture any part of a webpage with an easy-to-use screen capture tool
- Receive immediate design tips from advanced AI analysis
- Improve layouts, colour schemes, typography, and more
- Works on public websites, localhost, and development servers
- Learn design principles as you browse
- Applicable for designers, developers, and anyone interested in UI/UX

How It Works: 🔮

- Activate UI Copilot from your Chrome toolbar
- Follow the instructions to get a free Google Gemini API key
- Use the intuitive selection tool to capture any portion of a webpage
- Within seconds, receive a detailed list of design suggestions tailored to your selection

Who is it for? 🧙

Whether you're a professional designer looking for a second opinion, a developer wanting to enhance your UI skills, an entrepreneur, or just curious about good design practices, UI Copilot is your personal design assistant for the web.

Completely free! 💸

UI Copilot is completely free during our Beta period, offering almost unlimited feedback requests. Take advantage of this opportunity to refine your designs and boost your UI/UX skills without any cost! Your early feedback is critical in shaping the roadmap of the tool. The tool uses the powerful Google Gemini LLM models (Pro and Flash)!

Secure Always: 🛡️

Personal API Keys are stored in your Browsers Sync Storage, accessible only to this extension. The key is only used to perform API calls to the Google Gemini LLM service. Without this special step, the extension can't work! By bringing your own API Key, we are able to offer this extension at no cost to you, and operating within the rate limits of the LLM models!

Upgrade your design intuition and create better user experiences with UI Copilot - your AI-powered design partner, available anytime, anywhere on the web.

Install UI Copilot today and start receiving expert design feedback on any website or web application!

Changelog

0.4.1-beta: 
- Automatically switches models when rate limits hit
- Pro model as default model
- Adds success/failure toasts

0.3.1-beta
- Pro model only
